subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CINCINNATI, Oct. 14 (AP) — Dusty Baker has been hired as the manager of the Cincinnati Reds, agreeing to a three-year deal with a team coming off its seventh consecutive losing season.
snippet: CINCINNATI, Oct. 14 (AP) — Dusty Baker has been hired as the manager of the Cincinnati Reds, agreeing to a three-year deal with a team coming off its seventh consecutive losing season.
